FlavorTextOption.Text: How... how long has it been cousins? Our Doctrines has been put to test in this galaxy for nearly twenty thousand years. We have both survived. Now it is time to determine the fate of the races in this sector of space.

Attention interloper - heed this recorded message! This drone-vessel speaks with the voice and authority of the Ur-Quan. You are trespassing within Ur-Quan space. This is not permissible -- only subservience shall be tolerated. This drone now leaves to inform the Ur-Quan of your transgressions. You are commanded to remain here and await the arrival of the Ur-Quan. Disobedience will be punished. (Where is that sound coming from?)

We sense... something... something ancient... a sickly smell... a chilling wind. My ancestors scream from within their chambers in my mind. But, I cannot understand their words. This feeling... a memory? It sickens us. We are the Ur-Quan Kohr-Ah. Your presence here is premature. Our nature, the fulfillment of our fate requires your destruction. (Where is that sound coming from?)
